main event: Civilian and military observers watched a large, high-speed object over Petropavlovsk, USSR in 1960.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 300-400 yards in diameter and moved at a high speed of around 3500 mph.
The object came in from the southeast, passed over the city, and then disappeared to the northwest.
The object was surrounded by a bright light, and the observers could see no appendages or protruding parts on it.
The object was described as an unidentified elliptical-shaped object with a dark center and bright lights around the periphery emitting a pulsating light.
The object was observed for approximately 10-15 minutes before disappearing from view.
sighted object: large, high-speed, elliptical-shaped object with a dark center and bright pulsating lights
